summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Empire Way South from Henderson Street to the South City Limits at Ryan Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 17822 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
